document_data.caption: A map showing Sossar Bay in eastern Sossal.
document_data.name: Sossar Bay
document_data.mainbody: '''Sossar Bay''', which was also referred to as '''Sosser Bay''', was a small bay found in [[northeast Faer√ªn]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1bIc}}
document_data.Geography: Sossar Bay was located on the eastern shore of [[Sossal]] in the [[Cold Lands]]. The bay was a small extension of [[Yal Tengri]], the Great Ice Sea.
document_data.Locations: [[Naupau]], one of Sossal's few trading settlements, was located along Sossar Bay.
